title: Try before you buy
body: Petition for Bot games to offer access to every single champion and skin that is available to buy from the shop (No Legendary Skins like Pax Tf and Urf Ww) as a try before you buy to save a whole lot of trouble with regrettable buys.

replies.body: Try before you buy - free champ weeks.

The wonderful world of PBE.

Also reason why there is free week champion rotation (for champs).
Skin spotlight (for skins)
Surrender at 20 (For all the things)
Nice proposition, but it is altogether unnecessary. Just search what it looks like online as an alternative, or ask friends that may have said skin?

sometimes skins attack animations and stuff "feel" different.

Also Riot wouldn't do this because companies like this "live" on regretabble purchases. They give you 3 refund tokens, but once they are gone, they get your money even if you don't like your purchase which usually means you use more money to get another champ/skin that you really want. Twice the money for them.
